articles.title: Highly contagious Delta variant​ could cause next COVID-19 wave: "This virus will still find you" - CBS News
articles.description: Just 45% of Americans fully vaccinated and only 16 states that have fully vaccinated more than half of their populations,
articles.content:

articles.title: American to Cancel Hundreds of Flights Even as Travel Demand Surges - AVweb
articles.description: Faced with a cocktail of labor, weather, and demand issues, American is cutting back on flights through at least mid-July.
articles.content: A combination of labor shortage, a surge in demand, and challenging weather events has American Airlines canceling several hundred flights through at least mid-July. As the coronavirus pandemic slowl… [+1249 chars]
